definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block name="block_mode">COLLIDER</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="item_animation"><field name="name">WeaponArtItem</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="animation"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">animation.weaponartitem.bash</field></block></value><next><block type="play_animation"><field name="TEXT">bash</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:hitbox_type</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Simply defines what hitbox to use.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">bash</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" connects.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block w="160">This is a multiplier affecting the size of the hitbox.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block name="VAR">global:hitbox_distance</field><comment pinned="false" h="133" w="233">This is a multiplier affecting the vector defining how far in front of the player's camera should the hitbox be made.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block
